server_side

Interface ServerHandlerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PictionaryServer

    public interface ServerHandlerInterface
    Server-Handler communication interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Adds the user to game.

    • Method Detail

      • isTestMode

        boolean isTestMode()
        Checks if server is in test mode.
        Returns:
        true, if is test mode

        Checks if is username is taken.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true, if is name taken

        Removes the handler.

                  throws IOException
        Send message to client.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        message - the message
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

      • sendBroadcastMessage

        void sendBroadcastMessage(String senderUsername,
                          String message)
                   throws IOException
        Send broadcast message. Message is sent to each connected user
        Parameters:
        senderUsername - the sender username
        message - the message
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

      • addUserToGame

        Adds the user to game.
        Parameters:

      • checkWord

        void checkWord(String word,
               String username)
        Check if word guessed by player is proper. This method is used while game is running
        Parameters:
        word - the word guessed by player
        username - the username of guessing player
